DERBY-5247: Warnings regarding XPath displayed when generating JavaDoc
Primary change is adding java/tools/xml-apis.jar to the classpath when building JavaDocs to get rid of warnings. Secondary cleanup changes: o renamed jars.extra to jars.javadoc o added osgi to jars.javadoc o removed definitions/usages for JCC (IBM driver)
Patch file: derby-5247-1b-xpath_javadoc.diff
